title: Ep - 152 - JAMIE OTIS FROM THE BACHELOR AND MARRIED AT FIRST SIGHT
description:
Jamie Otis appeared as a contestant on the sixteenth season of The Bachelor. She is most known for participating in the first season of Married at First Sight, where she met her husband, Doug Hehner. The couple was later featured in a spin-off series, Married at First Sight: The First Year. Jamie discusses her experiences on both The Bachelor and Married at First Sight, this season of Married at First Sight, and her fertility journey. 


Director Tommy Avallone discusses The Bill Murray Stories: Life Lessons Learned from a Mythical Man, which is currently available on Netflix and Amazon. The film is one man’s journey to find meaning in Bill Murray’s many unexpected adventures with everyday people, rare and never-before seen footage of the comedic icon participating in stories previously presumed to be urban legend.


Brandon Alvarado hilariously reviews this season of Lindsay Lohan’s Beach Club.


Reality Life with Kate Casey
